item.title: He Took Her Life & Pretended to Be Her
item.description: Anastasia Grishman was an OnlyFans model and at 26 years old was becoming successful in her own right. Her husband Dmitry Khamlovsky was harbouring so much jealousy that he eventually snapped and murdered her... What are your thoughts on this chilling case? Seeing the signs beforehand, do you think this could have been somehow prevented?

media:content.media:title: He Took Her Life & Pretended to Be Her
media:content.media:description: Anastasia Grishman was an OnlyFans model and at 26 years old was becoming successful in her own right. Her husband Dmitry Khamlovsky was harbouring so much jealousy that he eventually snapped and murdered her... What are your thoughts on this chilling case? Seeing the signs beforehand, do you think this could have been somehow prevented?

item.title: She Was OBSESSED with Other People's Pregnancies! | Taylor Parker
item.description: Taylor Parker murdered Reagan Simmons-Hancock in the most barbaric of ways. The lies and deciept that she pushed on the build up to Reagan's death were unbelievable and her warped reality ended when she did the unthinkable. Join me in my latest true crime episode where we go through this tragic story. Em x

item.title: Evil Babysitter Got Exposed During the Interrogation!
item.description: Kristie Flood and Jeffrey Meyers were babysitting little Fallon Fridley when she sustained massive injuries. Join me in this latest true crime episode where I take you through the events that led to this little angels death. Em x

item.title: Many Restraining Orders, Yet a Bitter End
item.description: Eser was a young, beautiful Turkish woman who was just brilliant. Her life came to an end when she was brutally murdered at the hospital she worked by a man crazed by jealousy and obsession. What do you think could have been done to protect her? - Em x

item.title: Thе Evil Brothеrs Who KiIIеd For Fame - Bever Brothers
item.description: In 2014, brothers Michael and John Bever murdered five members of their family inside their Oklahoma home, including their parents and three younger siblings. Investigators said the teens planned the attack for months, inspired by mass violence and a desire for notoriety. One sibling survived by pretending to be dead. Both brothers received life sentences. The case stunned the nation and raised alarms about warning signs, online radicalization, and family safety. How can such extreme violence develop unnoticed inside a home?

item.title: They Did This to Her for "Fun" | Anita Cobby
item.description: In 1986, 26-year-old nurse Anita Cobby was abducted while walking home in Sydney after her train was cancelled. She was brutally assaulted and murdered by a group of men in one of Australia’s most notorious crimes. The case horrified the nation, leading to swift arrests, life sentences, and lasting changes in public safety awareness. Decades later, Anita’s name remains a symbol of loss and injustice. How did a routine journey home turn into a tragedy that reshaped a country?

item.title: Elderly Woman Thought the Teen Was Her "Friend"
item.description: This is not what we imagine when we talk about 14-year-olds. Not even old enough to drive, but the things he did runs my blood cold... What are your thoughts on this case? - Em x

item.title: 13 Year Old Did The Unthinkable To Get Revenge On Mother
item.description: In 2007, 13-year-old Paris Lee Bennett murdered his 4-year-old sister, Ella, in their Texas home, later manipulating his mother, Charity Lee, into believing she was responsible. From prison, Bennett continued to exert control, eventually admitting to planning further violence after his release. His case exposed chilling levels of manipulation, lack of remorse, and failures to recognize extreme warning signs. How can such calculated cruelty develop so young—and go unchecked for so long?

item.title: They Found Toddler's Tiny Body in a Box
item.description: I know I cover a lot of cases where children are hurt and killed. The sis a subject case to my heart and I feel the monster who do these crimes need to be known. The tragic murder of Riley Ann Sawyers AKA Baby Grace is a case that will shock and upset the most hardened true crime fan. Kimberly Dawn Trenor is the mother in this case. She married a master called Clyde Zeigler Jr. and what unfolded is just horrific. Em x

item.title: She Left Her Strapped to a Bean Bag for 2 Hours!
item.description: How can this person work at a NURSERY?

item.title: She Was Kept in a Box for 7 Years!
item.description: Colleen Stan was taken by Cameron Hooke rand his wife Janice Hooker and kept against her will for 7 years. She was made to live in a box. This is a twisted story of kidnap, imprisonment and abuse.This is the story of The girl a the box.

item.title: "Say Goodbye to Your CHILDREN!" | The Arthur Freeman Case
item.description: Arthur Freeman became infamous for the tragic murder of his four-year-old daughter, Darcey Freeman, on January 29, 2009. Freeman, during the height of a bitter custody battle with his ex-wife, Peta Barnes, drove his children to Melbourne's West Gate Bridge. There, in a shocking act of revenge, he stopped his car, took Darcey out, and threw her over the bridge into the water below. Heartbreaking, chilling,infuriating... What are your genuine thoughts? x Em

item.title: Bodycam Footage Reveals Man with 6 Minors in His Car!
item.description: This bodycam footage later on revealed something MUCH DARKER. It's chilling and absolutely nauseating. Have you seen this footage before? Let me know in the comments! - Em x

item.title: From Picture-Perfect Family to a Bitter End | The Epsom Horror
item.description: Emma Pattison, the headteacher of Epsom College, and her seven-year-old daughter, Lettie, were tragically shot and killed by her husband, George Pattison, on February 5, 2023. George, who was a chartered accountant, then turned the weapon on himself. An undescribable tragedy... What are your thoughts?

item.title: He 'Accidentally' Poured Boiling Water Over Her
item.description: Donna Jones suffered horrific injuries after her partner poured boiling water over her, later claiming it was an accident. Instead of seeking urgent medical help, he left her to endure extreme pain and worsening injuries for 11 days. By the time authorities intervened, it was too late to save her. The case exposed devastating neglect, cruelty, and the fatal consequences of inaction after violence. How can someone choose abandonment over responsibility when a life is clearly at risk?

item.title: When Jealousy Leads to Obsession | Caroline Reed Robertson
item.description: Emma Kenny delves into one of Melbourne's most haunting cases - the tragic murder of young Rachel Barber at the hands of her former babysitter, Caroline Reed Robertson. Venture into the heart of a crime driven by envy, obsession, and misplaced desires. Through Emma's insightful lens, explore the intricate dynamics of a relationship gone terribly wrong and the tragic consequences that followed. Join us as we seek understanding in a story that left an entire community reeling.

item.title: The Tragic End of Annie Kasprzak and the Disturbing Acts of her boyfriend Chris Bagshaw
item.description: Immerse yourself in a journey through the shadows with Emma Kenny as she meticulously investigates the heart-wrenching case of Annie Kasprzak, a young life senselessly extinguished. Emma navigates through the chilling details, unraveling Chris Bagshaw’s disturbing acts that led to this unthinkable tragedy. Through in-depth analysis, exclusive insights, and a compassionate narrative, Emma sheds light on the enduring impact on Annie’s community and the relentless pursuit of justice. This episode is a somber reflection on loss, the search for answers, and the hope that truth will prevail.

item.title: Maternal Madness: The Atrocities of Theresa Knorr Unveiled
item.description: In this chilling episode, psychologist Emma Kenny dissects the terrifying and abhorrent case of Theresa Knorr, a mother who became an embodiment of evil and committed unspeakable acts of violence against her own children.

item.title: When a Mother and Brother Does the Unthinkable
item.description: This is the tragic tale of a 15-year-old teen, Timothy Ferguson, who got brutally tortured by his own family. It's heartbreaking and the details of the case is absolutely nauseating... What are your thoughts?

item.title: Teen's Chilling Reaction After Taking Her FRIEND's Life!
item.description: Teen's Chilling Reaction After Taking Her FRIEND's Life!
